snippet: David Chase, the creator and show runner of "The Sopranos," discusses his memories of working with the "Mad Men" creator Matthew Weiner; how he organized its seasons and ran its writers' room; and how he now regards the memorable "Sopranos" finale.
abstract: David Chase, the creator and show runner of "The Sopranos," discusses his memories of working with the "Mad Men" creator Matthew Weiner; how he organized its seasons and ran its writers' room; and how he now regards the memorable "Sopranos" finale.

headline.main: What the Creator of 'The Sopranos' Taught the Creator of 'Mad Men'
